title: Question about the Star Guardian Ahri figurine
body: Why do we need to wait until January 2018 to receive it? Just a question.

replies.body: Those figures are still only up for Pre-order. They just haven't officially released yet is all!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BEMwHpAp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-19T00:53:21.366+0000)
>
> Those figures are still only up for Pre-order. They just haven't officially released yet is all!

Okay, yeah as I said, just asking, not impatient, just curious
